name: Al-waleed
bio: A developer with a never-ending passion for learning. Onyx is my guitar, which I enjoy playing in my free time. Ember is my coffee machine and she starts my day everyday. Also, Clementine is my 3D printer, which creates a variety of three-dimensional objects. These hobbies show my diverse interests and dedication to pursuing my passions.

languages.name: Swift
languages.desc: My very first programming language, which I learned under the hands of Omar Al-Ibrahim at Kuwait Codes, in which I won the first place prize.

languages.name: JavaScript
languages.desc: My second and favorite programming language.

languages.name: Unity
languages.desc: Third thing I learned is game development using C#.

languages.name: React/Native
languages.desc: My favorite front-end JS framework! Funny thing is that I learned React Native before React and it was disastrous.

languages.name: Flutter
languages.desc: Enjoyed this Dart framework because everything IS a widget.

languages.name: NodeJS
languages.desc: Back-end stuff which I don’t really enjoy under stress. I use ExpressJS along with MongoDB to create APIs.
